text: Lyudmila Borisova (; born 3 August 1966) is a retired Russian runner who specialized in the 3000 metres. She holds the current world record in the rarely contested 4 x 800 metres relay (7:50.17 minutes with Nadezhda Olizarenko, Lyubov Gurina and Irina Podyalovskaya). ==Achievements== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing the |- |1989 |World Indoor Championships |Budapest, Hungary |6th |3000 m |9:04.75 |- |rowspan=2|1991 |World Championships |Tokyo, Japan |13th |3000 m |8:51.49 |- |Universiade |Sheffield, England |4th |3000 m | |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |1993 |World Championships |Stuttgart, Germany |align="center" | 8th |3000 m |8:40.78 |- |rowspan=2|1994 |Goodwill Games |St. Petersburg, Russia |align="center" | 4th |3000 m |8:48.77 |- |European Championships |Helsinki, Finland |align="center" | 5th |3000 m |8:41.71 |- |1995 |World Championships |Gothenburg, Sweden |align="center" | 5th |1500 m | 4:04.78 |- |1996 |Olympic Games |Atlanta, United States |align="center" | 7th |1500 m |4:05.90 |} ==External links== * Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Russian female middle-distance runners Category:Russian female long-distance runners Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic athletes of Russia Category:IAAF world record holders (relay) Category:Universiade medalists in athletics (track and field) Category:Universiade gold medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Soviet Athletics Championships winners Category:Competitors at the 1991 Summer Universiade Category:Medalists at the 1983 Summer Universiade
title: Lyudmila Borisova
